posts.post_content:
[High Ground](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=High Ground) allows the Slivers to copy BOTH of Two-Headed Dragon's abilities.   
  
It's Over Anakin! The Slivers have the High Ground! x.X  
  
You UNDERESTIMATE MY--wait, did you say SLIVERS?! JEEZ I signed up with the wrong Sith :P  
  
(Later, on Coruscant)  
  
WHAT did you do to p iss off the SLIVERS???......my master?  
  
Well, now, there's a funny story about that....I maybe once accidentally crushed a larval Sliver Queen?  
  
YOU WHAT?!?!? .......that's just plain stupid. You handle the Slivers yourself, I don't take suicide missions. I'm joining the Rebels. :P
